title: NextNumTransformer: Real-Time Vision Transformer with Attention Visualization
description: Production-ready Vision Transformer implementation featuring real-time attention visualization and autoregressive sequence prediction. Built from scratch with custom multi-head attention, spatial patch embedding, and live webcam inference with attention heatmaps.

title: KaraokeAI: Neural Voice-to-MIDI Transcription
description: End-to-end deep learning system for real-time voice-to-MIDI transcription using frozen Whisper encoder with custom transformer decoder. Features sliding window inference, multi-lingual training on GTSinger dataset, and novel Demucs-CREPE preprocessing pipeline.

title: Transformer-Based Music Genre Classification with Hybrid Intelligence
description: Sophisticated music genre classification system that adapts OpenAI's Whisper transformer architecture for music understanding. Combines deep learning with traditional music theory heuristics to provide comprehensive audio analysis including genre classification, mood detection, key identification, and quality assessment through a real-time web interface.

title: DemucsML: Advanced Voice-to-Instrumental Diffusion Pipeline
description: Production-ready ML engineering pipeline that combines Facebook's DEMUCS with experimental latent diffusion models for voice-to-instrumental generation. Features enterprise-grade source separation, VAE latent space encoding, and conditional diffusion models with a modern Flask web interface for real-time audio processing and generation.

title: Two Tower Hybrid Search Engine
description: A hybrid search engine combining keyword (TF-IDF) and semantic search using a Two-Tower neural network. Users can tune the balance between keyword and semantic relevance.

title: HackerNews Score Predictor with Word Embeddings Implementation
description: A machine learning project that predicts HackerNews post scores using title embeddings and feature engineering with custom Word2Vec implementation.

title: Live Vision Encoder - Transformers (ViT)
description: Built the encoder part of the Vision Transformer (ViT) from scratch in PyTorch for handwritten digit classification with a real-time webcam demo that recognizes digits as you show them.

title: DeepNavierStokes: Solving the RANS equations for 1D channel flow using neural networks
description: This project is a Master's thesis at Harvard University, focusing on solving the Reynolds-Averaged Navier-Stokes (RANS) equations using neural networks. It integrates deep learning techniques with traditional fluid dynamics to achieve ultra fast simulations with similar accuracy to traditional methods.
